actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the right of unborn individuals.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no unborn person shall be deprived of life by any person except as required to save the life of the mother when a reasonable medical certainty exists that continuation of pregnancy may cause the death of the mother.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the right of unborn individuals.
